0: You have to book the SPA in advance
The staff seemed to be somehow bored tired not that friendly than in the other portugese hotels
If you do not have a front river room which were all booked at the time my room faced the parking lot of the hotel
The closets and some walls were very flimsy
The food was superbI liked everything even though the weather was not in our favour
Would have been happy to spend more time here and would recommend it to friends
There were bugs coming out of the walls
The views from the indoor and outside pool are totally ruined by very dirty protective windows and glass panels
The viewsome windows were not cleaned so not full enjoying the view
1: State of the art top class hotel
The pools are fantastic although they era medium sized
Inside pool open 24h with warm water
During my stay I noticed that it was under expansion upwards the hill
I did not expect this caliber of cuisine
The bar and the lounge area around it with view
Go see Helena and eat at her restaurant at the top of the hill from the hotel
2: I am then offered a 20 discount on my next stay
They were renovating their in house spa during our stay so they gave us a free river cruise along the Douro river which was fantastic
Breakfast was tasty and good choices
Lots of space modern great view of river from room overall good facilities friendly staff
Friendly staff beautiful views very comfortable great breakfast
The hotel is brand new therefore is clean and has great facilities namely the indoor pool and spa area
The staff were all very helpful and joyous from the front desk to the restaurant bars spa and cleaning staff
I love how big and luxurious our terrace suite it the breakfast spread was superb and the staff were all very helpful flexible and friendly
I had a very comfortable stay at this hotel ending it with a great breakfast before moving on giving me a good start for the day
